availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Augustus M. Thomas (Clark County and Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Clark County and Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Thomas and Frances Thomas. Married to Justina Haggard Thomas in Winchester, Kentucky, on May 7, 1846. Father of Nancy E. Thomas, William Thomas, Ann E. Thomas, John H. Thomas, and Martin Thomas. Farmer in Clark County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Clark County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2, p. 35A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2, p. 301.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 823-24.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clark County Marriages, Film #001943687, p. 135.
